text: Pehle apne marketing budget ko allocate karein.  Kitna paisa aap Google Ads, Facebook Ads, ya social media influencers pe kharch kar sakte hain?  Har channel ke liye ek specific amount allocate karein.
Different channels explore karein jaise ke Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram marketing, aur email marketing.  Dekhein kon sa channel aapke target audience tak sabse effectively pahunchta hai.
Yaad rakhein, consistent marketing efforts bohat zaroori hain.  Ek baar ad campaign chalane se kaam nahin chalega.  Regularly apne marketing campaigns ko optimize aur improve karte rahein.
Apne results ko track aur analyze karna na bhooliye.  Kon sa channel sabse zyada ROI de raha hai?  Apne marketing strategy ko improve karne ke liye data ka use karein.
